review: Does what it says it does. No brainer to connect.Best daily use of your Amazon Prime membership if you're streaming movies, TV shows, games, etc.

review: very easy to set up, but required several attempts to input info. easy to use but seems to do better later at night rather than at "prime viewing time". not sure why that is. will have to look into that. great choices of movies/shows. well worth the $$.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazing. Got rid of cable! Works really well. Buffers sometimes but nothing that gets annoying.
